description: The KÜHL DECEPTR™ Men’s Pant combines trail-tough performance with modern, versatile style. Featuring our exclusive TUFFLITE™ fabric, the lightweight DECEPTR's rugged durability, superior stretch, and articulated design deliver premium comfort on the move. A water-resistant finish and maximum sun protection (UPF 50+) take these men's hiking pants from the office to the trail with confidence.
name: Kuhl Deceptr Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
